package.name: Feed_Manager_Version_1_1_2
package.summary: Easily list your products with leading shopping engines and marketplaces such as Google, Amazon, Shopzilla, Pricegrabber and Shopbot
package.description:
Reach larger customers by connecting your store to leading shopping engines and marketplaces.

Optimize the feeds to increase rankings on shopping engines and marketplaces.
package.notes: It is optimized to display paginated products and will load faster
